text: Sara Arfeen Khan is an Indian Actress and Television host. She is best known for her role as Alka Tiwari in STAR One's hit serial Dhoondh Legi Manzil Humein and Love Ka Hai Intezaar as Maharani Vijayalakshmi Ranawat. ==Television== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
